On fly leaf [1]: Muḥammad Saʻīd ... al-Ḥusaynī al-Dimashqī, Rabīʻ al-Awwal [1]282 [1865]; Muḥammad Abū al-... al-Ḥusaynī al-..., 17 Jumādá al-ūlá 1317 [1899];.
According to the colophon (f. 60v), copy completed in the hand of Sulaymān al-ʻAjlūnī in 1162 AH [1748-9 AD].
Cream laid paper with watermarks. 21.8 x 16.5 cm. (17 x 10 cm.)
Written in one column, 19 lines per page, in black.

With this is bound: Hādhihi risālat Iḍāʼat al-badrayn fī tarjamat al-Shaykhayn (ff. 61r-84v) -- Ḥawāshī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Risālah al-waḍʻīyah al-ʻAḍudīyah (ff. 88r-119r) -- Hādhihī al-risālah Naṣīḥat al-ikhwān fī ṣawm Rajab wa-Shaʻbān wa-Ramaḍān (ff. 120r-154v).
Bound in paper boards ; brown leather over spine and fore-edge flap.
MS Arab 218. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
